homepage.htmlText:
Welcome

I appreciate your interest in Dallas Cowboys season tickets. Included in this presentation are a few options that are located in areas that you are interested in. As discussed, there are two different routes to pay for the seat option. Both payment options are included in the bottom tool bar for each seat location you select. With our inventory being extremely limited and changing daily, please give me a call directly at 817-892-4400 after you review and we can move forward.

Thanks and Go Cowboys!

viewData.annual_pricing:
* Pricing is on a per seat basis year 1 cost year 2+ cost

SEAT OPTION DOWN PAYMENT *

DUE TO SECURE THE SEATS 		$1,250.00 N/a

ANNUAL TICKET PRICE *

DUE MAY 1ST 		$1,250.00 $1,250.00

ANNUAL SEAT OPTION PAYMENT *

DUE MARCH 1ST 		N/A $367.62

TOTAL COST *

 $2,500.00 $1,617.62
Annual Pricing - A seat option ensures you the option to the seats for the remaining term of AT&T Stadium. Paying the seat option annually involves paying a down payment the 1st year and making annual payments each year after. This route gives you the ability to have a smaller cash outlay upfront while also giving you the ability to pay the seat options in full at any time with no penalty if you choose to do so. The seat option can be transferred or resold at any point during the term.
viewData.full_pricing:
* Pricing is on a per seat basis year 1 cost year 2+ cost

DUE TO SECURE THE SEATS 		$5,000.00 N/A

ANNUAL TICKET PRICE *

DUE MAY 1ST 		$1,250.00 $1,250.00

TOTAL COST *

 $6,250.00 $1,250.00
Pay in full - A seat option ensures you the option to the seats for the remaining term of AT&T Stadium. Paying in full for your seat option locks in your seats for the remaining length of the term. By paying in full, you will have a higher outlay of cash upfront but, will pay less over the term then one going with the annual route. The seat option can be transferred or resold at any point during the term.

viewData.amenties:
• Roomier, cushioned seats
  • Best sightlines (between the goal lines)
  • Access to private club areas
  • VIP Entrances
  • Option to purchase seats to most other events here at the stadium
  • Opportunity to purchase premium parking near the stadium

Pay in full - A seat option ensures you the option to the seats for the remaining term of AT&T Stadium. Paying in full for your seat option locks in your seats for the remaining length of the term. By paying in full, you will have a higher outlay of cash upfront but, will pay less over the term then one going with the annual route. The seat option can be transferred or resold at any point during the term.
viewData.amenties:
• Roomier, cushioned seats
  • Access to main Cowboys Club
  • VIP Stadium Entrances
  • All inclusive Food and Beverage (beer, wine, and soda) included in Founders Club for all Cowboys games
  • Guaranteed best seats available at face value to every event at the stadium (includes Super Bowls, Final Fours and all events at the stadium)
  • Complimentary VIP designated parking spot right in front of the stadium with your name on the wheel stop
  • Access to the Miller Lite Field Club on both the Cowboys and Visitors side of the stadium (club where the players run on/off the field)
  • Trip for two every 5 years to an away game with the team
  • VIP training camp access, annual golf tournament, and invites to other exclusive team events
  • Pregame sideline passes to one game each year, postgame sideline passes to one game each year

viewData.amenties:
• Roomier, cushioned seats
  • Access to main Cowboys Club
  • VIP Stadium Entrances
  • No Annual season ticket cost – The cost of preseason, regular, and post season tickets is included in the seat option price.
  • All inclusive Food and Beverage (beer, wine, soda, and liquor) included in the Legends Club for all Cowboys games and third party events
  • Guaranteed best seats available at face value to every event at the stadium (includes Super Bowls, Final Fours and all events at the stadium)
  • Complimentary VIP designated parking spot right in front of the stadium with your name on the wheel stop
  • Access to the Miller Lite Field Club on both the Cowboys and Visitors side of the stadium (club where the players run on/off the field)
  • Trip for two every 5 years to an away game with the team
  • VIP training camp access, annual golf tournament, and invites to other exclusive team events
  • Pregame sideline passes to one game each year, postgame sideline passes to one game each year

contact_us.htmlText:
Thank You

We are going to have a promising  2016-17 Season. 

I'm looking forward to seeing you at AT&T Stadium!

Let's go Cowboys!
